title: Hong Kong to sentence media mogul Jimmy Lai in national security trial
summary_full: Hong Kong pro-democracy media tycoon Jimmy Lai will be sentenced on Monday over national security crimes that could see him jailed for life, with some rights groups and Western nations still demanding his release. - Stiff penalties - Long a thorn in Beijing's side, Lai was prosecuted under a Hong Kong national security law that was imposed by Beijing in 2020, a year after huge and sometimes violent pro-democracy protests in the finance hub.
